metadata.title: CVE-2023-27789 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue found in TCPprep v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via the cidr2cidr function at the cidr.c:178 endpoint.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.4').
